dict.acceptation: 满意的，满足的；清偿过的；确信的，毫无疑问的；
使满意( satisfy的过去式和过去分词)；

sent.orig: If they are satisfied, then the world is by definition satisfied.
sent.trans: 如果他们是满足的，此时这个世界就被定义为满足。

sent.orig: A man who is always satisfied with himself is seldom satisfied with other.
sent.trans: 老是满足于自己的人，很少满足于别人。

sent.orig: Sheol and Abaddon are never satisfied, And the eyes of man are never satisfied.
sent.trans: 20阴间和灭亡总不满足，人的眼目也总不满足。

sent.orig: Life's anguish has two, one is desire is not satisfied, 2 it is satisfied.
sent.trans: 人生的苦闷有二，一是欲望没有被满足，二是它得到了满足。

sent.orig: Sheol and Abaddon are never satisfied, Nor are the eyes of man ever satisfied.
sent.trans: 箴27:20阴间和灭亡、永不满足．人的眼目、也是如此。
